Mankon bụ asụsụ Grassfields a na-asụ na Cameroon
Ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na Mundum na Mendankwe-Nkwen
Ya na Mundum, a na-akpọ ya Ngemba
Enwere ọtụtụ olumba dị iche iche: Mankunge (Ngemba), Nsongwa (Songwa, Bangwa), Shomba (Chomba, Bamechom), Mbutu (Bambutu), Njong (Banjong), Bagangu (Akum) na Alatening.
